front.title: Standard for N times 64 kilobit per second optical fiber interfaces between teleprotection and multiplexer equipment

author.organization: Institute of Electrical and Electronics Engineers

front.abstract: An optical interface for use between teleprotection and digital multiplexer equipment that can operate at a data rate of N times 64 kilobit per second where N = 1, 212 is described. Requirements for both physical connection and the communications timing are also included.
